body_html: Is this easily reproducible? It's likely because we changed the shape of reduction operations (and indexing a 1-dimensional tensor) to be 0-dimensional (with a value) instead of 1-dimensional.
body_text: Is this easily reproducible?  It's likely because we changed the shape of reduction operations (and indexing a 1-dimensional tensor) to be 0-dimensional (with a value) instead of 1-dimensional.
body: Is this easily reproducible?  It's likely because we changed the shape of reduction operations (and indexing a 1-dimensional tensor) to be 0-dimensional (with a value) instead of 1-dimensional.
